snippet: Barclays named Hugh E. McGee III, one of the firm's top deal makers, as its most senior corporate and investment banker in the Americas on Thursday as part of a broader reorganization within the bank.
abstract: Barclays named Hugh E. McGee III, one of the firm's top deal makers, as its most senior corporate and investment banker in the Americas on Thursday as part of a broader reorganization within the bank.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Barclays Names McGee Top Americas Corporate and Investment Banker
